mapper.select: select * from tuition t left outer join student s on t.stu_no = s.stu_no left outer join award a on s.stu_no = a.stu_no left outer join scholarship sc on a.scholarship_no = sc.scholarship_no order by s.major

select rownum, T.major major, T.tuition tuition from (select major, sum(tuition) tuition from (select t.stu_no stuNo, s.major major, (t.tuition - nvl(A.scholarship, 0)) tuition from tuition t join student s on t.stu_no = s.stu_no left outer join (select a.award_no awardNo, a.stu_no stuNo, s.scholarship scholarship from award a join scholarship s on a.scholarship_no = s.scholarship_no where a.approved = 'Y') A on t.stu_no = A.stuNo where t.deposit_state = 'Y') group by major order by tuition desc) T
where rownum <= 5

select f.faculty_name faculty, sum((t.tuition - nvl(A.scholarship, 0))) tuition from student s join tuition t on s.stu_no = t.stu_no join department d on s.dept_no = d.dept_no join faculty f on d.faculty_no = f.faculty_no left outer join (select a.award_no awardNo, a.stu_no stuNo, s.scholarship scholarship from award a join scholarship s on a.scholarship_no = s.scholarship_no where a.approved = 'Y') A on s.stu_no = A.stuNo where t.deposit_state = 'Y' group by f.faculty_name order by tuition desc
